titleHead: Representative confirm - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Do you want to register a representative?
subtitle: Your representative can be anyone who's helping you with your appeal and you think should be kept updated. For example, a welfare rights adviser, family member or carer.
evidence: submit evidence (and see any that’s submitted)
talkToUs: talk to us on your behalf during your appeal
phoneUp: If you don’t have their details now, you can register them over the phone later. You'll be sent the number after you've submitted your appeal.

hasRepresentative.yes: Yes, I want to register a representative
hasRepresentative.no: No, I don't want to register a representative

error.required: You have to say whether you want to register a representative. Select either yes or no.
